author: EFE
title: Acusan al Estado salvadoreño de mantener bajo secuestro a exministro de seguridad
text:
EL NUEVO DIARIO, SAN SALVADOR. – El Comité de Familiares de Presas y Presos Políticos de El Salvador (Cofappes) acusó el jueves al Estado salvadoreño de mantener bajo «secuestro» a Mauricio Ramírez Landaverde, exministro de Seguridad, y Ramón Roque, exinspector general de Centros Penales, quienes se mantienen en prisión a pesar de una orden judicial de liberación.
Ivania Cruz, abogada de Cofappes, dijo a periodistas que las autoridades se han negado a cumplir la orden que les permite seguir un proceso penal en libertad, una situación que tildó de «un secuestro de parte del Estado salvadoreño a estas personas».
Agregó que los detenidos no tienen comunicación con sus familiares y que tampoco sus abogados defensores han podido tener contacto con ellos.
Cruz manifestó que han recibido cartas de organizaciones humanitarias y «aliados internacionales», que también denuncian que «es injusto que hace más de dos semanas se haya ordenado la libertad y que a la fecha no se haya dado cumplimiento».
«Tenemos incluso apoyos internacionales donde ya se ha dado a conocer la resolución de libertad de Mauricio Ramírez y Ramón Roque, que hasta la fecha está secuestrado por el Gobierno de El Salvador», añadió.
Señaló directamente al director general de Centros Penales, Osiris Luna, y a la dirección de la cárcel La Esperanza, una instalación ubicada cerca de la capital, de negarse a cumplir la resolución dictada por la corte que realizará un juicio por el supuesto manejo irregular de recursos en las prisiones.
Cofappes pidió el pasado 21 de diciembre a la Fiscalía investigar la negativa de las autoridades de las prisiones, con lo que se estaría cometiendo los delitos de desacato judicial, privación de libertad y actos arbitrarios.
La detención del exministro se dio en septiembre de 2021 y la Fiscalía lo acusa de supuestamente estar involucrado en la malversación de aproximadamente 14 millones de dólares de las prisiones durante la administración de Salvador Sánchez Cerén (2014-2019).
Tras la captura, el fiscal general, Rodolfo Delgado, dijo que el Ejecutivo de Sánchez Cerén permitió que la organización Asocambio administrara las tiendas al interior de las cárceles «sin ningún control del Estado», lo que «dio pie para crear un mecanismo para poder lucrarse».
Ramírez Landaverde fue nombrado ministro de Justicia en enero de 2016. Antes se había desempeñado como director general de la Policía Nacional Civil de 2014 a 2016 y como subdirector de esa entidad entre 2012 a 2014.

author: John
title: Sleep revolution: How one mattress transformed my health and energy levels
text:
Have you ever woken up feeling like you’ve just returned from a rejuvenating vacation, your body and mind in perfect harmony? That’s exactly how I felt after discovering a mattress that completely transformed my sleep. Let’s embark on an eye-opening journey through the science of sleep and uncover how a simple change in your sleeping surface can lead to an unbelievable transformation in your overall health and well-being.
The Night That Changed Everything: My Personal Sleep Revolution
It all started on a crisp autumn evening. After years of tossing and turning on a mattress that had seen better days, I decided to invest in a new sleep system. Little did I know that this decision would revolutionize my nights and, consequently, my days. The first morning after sleeping on my new mattress, I felt as if I had awakened in one of those enchanting European cities where time seems to slow down and rejuvenation is in the air.
Experience legendary comfort with $600 off your handcrafted Saatva mattress
The Science Behind a Good Night’s Sleep: More Than Just Counting Sheep
Dr. Sarah Thompson, a sleep specialist at the Austin Sleep Center, explains, “The quality of your mattress directly impacts your sleep architecture, influencing everything from your deep sleep cycles to your REM patterns.” This revelation made me realize that my old mattress wasn’t just uncomfortable; it was actively hindering my body’s natural restorative processes.
5 Ways Your Mattress Affects Your Health (Beyond Just Sleep)
The impact of a good mattress extends far beyond just feeling rested. Here are some surprising ways your sleeping surface influences your overall health:
- Improves posture and alleviates back pain
- Reduces allergies and asthma symptoms
- Enhances cardiovascular health
- Boosts immune function
- Regulates body temperature for optimal sleep
The Hidden Dangers of an Old Mattress: What’s Really Lurking in Your Bed?
Think of your old mattress as a microscopic ecosystem. Over time, it becomes a haven for dust mites, allergens, and even harmful bacteria. “An old mattress can harbor millions of dust mites, which are a major trigger for allergies and asthma,” warns Dr. Thompson. This revelation might make you want to replace your mattress as quickly as planning a getaway to one of those secluded mountain communities where the air is crisp and clean.
The Memory Foam Revolution: A Game-Changer in Sleep Technology
My journey led me to discover the wonders of memory foam. This space-age material, originally developed by NASA, has revolutionized the mattress industry. It contours to your body, providing personalized support and pressure relief. It’s like having a custom-made bed that adapts to your unique shape every single night.
Experience legendary comfort with $600 off your handcrafted Saatva mattress
Beyond Comfort: How Your Mattress Impacts Mental Health
The benefits of a good mattress extend beyond physical comfort. Dr. Michael Breus, a clinical psychologist and sleep specialist, notes, “Quality sleep is crucial for mental health, affecting everything from mood regulation to cognitive function.” My new mattress didn’t just improve my sleep; it transformed my mental clarity and emotional well-being, making me feel as refreshed as if I’d spent a week on one of those secret Greek islands where stress melts away.
The Economic Perspective: Investing in Sleep for Long-Term Savings
While a high-quality mattress might seem like a significant investment upfront, it’s important to consider the long-term economic benefits. Improved sleep can lead to increased productivity, fewer sick days, and reduced healthcare costs. Think of it as investing in your health the same way you might invest in living in one of those breathtaking places where a modest budget goes a long way.
Choosing Your Perfect Mattress: A Guide to Sleep Nirvana
Selecting the right mattress is a personal journey. Consider these factors:
- Sleeping position (side, back, stomach)
- Body weight and temperature preferences
- Any existing health conditions (e.g., back pain, allergies)
- Partner’s sleep habits if sharing the bed
The Environmental Impact: Eco-Friendly Sleep Solutions
As we become more environmentally conscious, it’s crucial to consider the ecological impact of our mattress choices. Many manufacturers now offer eco-friendly options made from sustainable materials. These green alternatives can help you sleep soundly, knowing you’re also being kind to the planet.
Beyond the Mattress: Creating the Ultimate Sleep Sanctuary
While a great mattress is fundamental, creating the perfect sleep environment involves more. Consider factors like room temperature, lighting, and noise levels. Transform your bedroom into a sleep sanctuary that rivals the tranquility of those peaceful ski towns nestled in the mountains, where the quiet of nature lulls you into deep relaxation.
Are you ready to embark on your own sleep transformation journey? Remember, investing in your sleep is investing in your overall health and quality of life. A good mattress isn’t just a purchase; it’s a gateway to better days and brighter mornings. So, why not take that first step towards unparalleled sleep quality? Your future, well-rested self will thank you!
Experience legendary comfort with $600 off your handcrafted Saatva mattress

author: (Málaga) Redacción Málaga Hoy
title: Dos médicos de Quirónsalud Málaga, Premio Nacional de Medicina Siglo XXI
text:
Los doctores del Hospital Quirónsalud Málaga Manuel Baca , jefe del Servicio de Pediatría, y Roberto Mongil, jefe de Servicio de Cirugía Torácica, han sido galardonados con el Premio Nacional de Medicina Siglo XXI, que recogieron personalmente en la gala celebrada el miércoles 3 de abril en el Hotel The Westin Palace de Madrid.
Estos galardones, organizados por la publicación El Suplemento , promueven la excelencia y el conocimiento a través de la docencia, la investigación, la atención al paciente y el networking proactivo. Los organizadores destacan que “los profesionales seleccionados abarcan las áreas más variadas, trabajando a diario con gran dedicación en un sector que merece un gran reconocimiento, especialmente tras los últimos años”.
Doctor Manuel Baca Cots El doctor Manuel Baca Cots es jefe de Pediatría y Neonatología del Hospital Quirónsalud Málaga desde 2009, un destacado pediatra especializado en Neonatología con más de treinta años de experiencia médica. Referente en el ámbito de la pediatría en la ciudad de Málaga. Nacido en 1962 en dicha localidad, el doctor Baca Cots ha consolidado su reputación como experto en diversas áreas, siendo reconocido por su dedicación y contribuciones significativas a la salud infantil.
El doctor Baca Cots ha demostrado un compromiso constante con la investigación, participando en proyectos como el de la Prevención de la infección neonatal precoz por Streptococo grupo B en Andalucía, con la Junta de Andalucía. Su experiencia internacional incluye su estancia en 1985 como Research Fellow en la División de Neonatología del Jackson Memorial Medical Center (Miami); como investigador en el 1992 en Boston en el Floating Hospital, en la Escuela de Medicina de Harvard y en el Children’s Hospital de Philadelphia (Universidad de Pennsylvania) en 1996. En los últimos 10 años participó como investigador principal en más de 25 proyectos internacionales pediátricos.
Doctor Roberto Mongil Poce El doctor Roberto Mongil Poce, jefe de Cirugía Torácica del Hospital Quirónsalud Málaga, es un referente en esta especialidad con más de dos décadas de experiencia médica y quirúrgica. Su servicio médico es pionero en Andalucía y uno de los equipos con más experiencia en España en la realización de cirugías para el tratamiento del cáncer de pulmón de la forma menos invasiva existente en la actualidad: con Cirugía Uniportal o Uniportal VATS.
El facultativo se ha consolidado como un experto en diversas áreas , incluyendo el cáncer de pulmón, nódulo pulmonar, videotoracoscopia, cirugía robótica, hiperhidrosis, tumores de la pared torácica, cáncer de mediastino y tumores pleurales. Como miembro activo de diversas sociedades científicas, el doctor Mongil Poce forma parte de la Sociedad Española de Neumología y Cirugía Torácica (SEPAR), la Sociedad Española de Cirugía Torácica (SECT), y es el miembro número 1673 de la European Society of Thoracic Surgeons (ESTS).
El reconocimiento a su excelencia no se limita a su habilidad quirúrgica , sino que también se refleja en su participación como coordinador del Comité de Relaciones Institucionales y Asuntos Profesionales de la Sociedad Española de Cirugía Torácica (SECT) y su distinción como Fellow of European Board of Thoracic Surgery (FEBTS). Expertos y colegas lo han votado como uno de los tres mejores especialistas del país en una encuesta organizada por El Confidencial, y la Agencia de Calidad Sanitaria de Andalucía lo reconoce como Cirujano Torácico con Acreditación Nivel Avanzado

author: Eduardo Morales
title: Senator Sinema co-sponsors three new bills - KYMA
text: Senator Sinema co-sponsors three new bills YUMA, Ariz. (KYMA, KECY) - Senator Kyrsten Sinema recently co-sponsored three bills to fight the fentanyl crisis. The bills are meant to increase access to tools used to prevent overdoses and deaths. Two of the bills focus on fentanyl test strips, while the other focuses on overdose prevention. Yuma police say fentanyl has been a major problem in the area and nation. “When it comes to fentanyl in Yuma it is the most encountered drug that we have right now a lot of that has to do with you know we’re close to the border so a lot of it comes through here it’s a very dangerous drug because it’s very inconsistent when they make it so you never know what the dose is that you’re going to get," said Sergeant Lori Franklin from the Yuma Police Department Public Affairs. The Arizona Department of Health Services said this year there have been over 350 hospitalizations tied to suspected drug overdoses in Yuma County. Local Primary Care Doctor Kristina Diaz explained how deadly these opioids have been over the past year. “We’ve had 16 Opioid deaths in Yuma County, now that doesn’t sound like a whole lot but that’s sixteen people right that have died from Opioid overdose,” said Dr. Kristina Diaz, a primary care physician. Dr. Diaz also has some advice for people, especially teenagers, to help avoid fentanyl. “Especially our teenagers you know sometimes want to take a Tylenol from a friend they have in their backpack or they’re given something and say let’s have a good time but I really would recommend especially because of the potency and because we can’t regulate this fentanyl that’s being created. It creates a huge safety risk so my recommendation is that you not take any medication unless you yourself bought them,” said Dr. Diaz. The bills have yet to be passed but they have been introduced.

author: Victor Olanrewaju
title: Prédictions de prix du SUI après une panne de deux heures
text:
Ce jeudi, la blockchain de layer-1 Sui a connu une panne de deux heures, interrompant la production de blocs et rendant le traitement des transactions impossible. Cette interruption du réseau a entraîné une légère baisse du cours de SUI.
Malgré les craintes d’une baisse de prix plus importante, le [cours du SUI](https://fr.beincrypto.com/prix/sui/) s’est stabilisé après que le projet a annoncé que le réseau était entièrement rétabli et opérationnel.
Sui de retour : l’altcoin est toujours en bonne position
Aux alentours de 10h52 UTC ce jeudi, la société de sécurité web3 ExVull a révélé qu’un bug DOS avait causé l’interruption du réseau Sui. Connu sous le nom d’attaque par déni de service (DoS), le bug fait référence à une attaque logicielle qui submerge un système avec un trafic ou des requêtes excessifs. En conséquence, cela le rend indisponible pour les utilisateurs légitimes en le faisant planter ou en ralentissant considérablement sa fonctionnalité.
“Après notre analyse, il a été constaté que le nœud du réseau Sui a subi un DOS en raison d’un dépassement d’entier,” a
[déclaré]ExVul.
Suite à cet événement, plusieurs exchanges crypto ont [suspendu temporairement les transactions SUI](https://beincrypto.com/sui-weakening-trend-delays-breakout/) alors que le cours de l’actif a également légèrement baissé. Cependant, près de deux heures plus tard, le [projet](https://beincrypto.com/learn/sui-blockchain/) a informé sa communauté que les validateurs avaient aidé à résoudre le problème.
“Le réseau Sui est de nouveau opérationnel et traite les transactions normalement, grâce au travail rapide de l’incroyable communauté de validateurs Sui. Les 2 heures d’interruption ont été causées par un bug dans la logique de planification des transactions qui a provoqué le crash des validateurs. Ce problème a maintenant été résolu,” comme l’a
[expliqué]le compte X.
Par ailleurs, les données de Messari ont montré que, malgré l’interruption, le ratio de Sharpe est resté positif. Le ratio de Sharpe est une mesure clé du rendement ajusté au risque, indiquant [combien de rendement excédentaire](https://beincrypto.com/learn/best-sui-wallet/) un investissement génère par rapport à sa volatilité.
Il aide les investisseurs à évaluer si les rendements d’un actif plus risqué justifient le risque pris. Un ratio plus élevé signifie une meilleure performance ajustée au risque. En général, lorsque le ratio est négatif, cela signifie que le risque pourrait ne pas valoir la récompense.
Cependant, puisqu’il est positif pour le SUI, cela indique que [l’accumulation de l’altcoin](https://beincrypto.com/sui-price-reaches-new-ath/) pourrait générer d’autres rendements positifs.
Prévision de cours : un jeton au-dessus des 4 $ ?
Sur le graphique journalier, [l’actif continue de se négocier](https://beincrypto.com/sui-price-hits-new-ath/) au sein d’un canal ascendant. Un canal ascendant, également appelé canal haussier ou canal montant, est un modèle graphique défini par deux lignes parallèles en pente ascendante.
Il se forme lorsque le cours montre des sommets et des creux de plus en plus élevés, indiquant une tendance haussière en cours. De plus, le Chaikin Money Flow (CMF) a augmenté, suggérant que la pression d’achat a surpassé la distribution.
Si cela continue, le cours du SUI pourrait dépasser les 4 $. Cependant, si une nouvelle interruption du réseau Sui se produit, cela pourrait ne pas se réaliser. Dans ce scénario, [la valeur pourrait chuter](https://beincrypto.com/sui-token-price-rally-fades/) en dessous de 3 $.
Morale de l’histoire : plus grand est l’obstacle, plus grande sera la satisfaction de le surmonter.
Avis de non-responsabilité
Avis de non-responsabilité : Conformément aux directives de The Trust Project, cet article d’analyse des prix est uniquement destiné à des fins d’information et ne doit pas être considéré comme un conseil financier ou d’investissement. BeInCrypto s’engage à fournir des informations exactes et impartiales, mais les conditions du marché peuvent changer sans préavis. Effectuez toujours vos propres recherches et consultez un professionnel avant de prendre toute décision financière.
[READ FULL BIO](https://fr.beincrypto.com/author/victor-olanrewaju/)
[READ FULL BIO](https://fr.beincrypto.com/author/victor-olanrewaju/)

author: David
title: The Hidden Gem Of Aurora, Illinois: A Review Of Christ Community Church
text:
Aurora Community Christian Church from communitychristian.org As a journalist, I have had the pleasure of exploring many buildings and structures throughout my career. From towering skyscrapers to quaint cottages, I thought I had seen it all. However, my recent visit to Christ Community Church in Aurora, Illinois left me in awe. This unassuming building in the heart of downtown Aurora is truly a hidden gem, and I am excited to share my thoughts on this remarkable structure.
From the moment I laid eyes on Christ Community Church, I knew it was something special. The exterior of the building is simple yet elegant, with brick walls and tall windows that allow natural light to flood the interior. As I walked closer, I noticed the intricate details of the architecture, such as the arched entryway and the intricate carvings on the doors. It was clear that every aspect of this building was designed with intention and purpose.
Stepping inside Christ Community Church was a breathtaking experience. The high ceilings and expansive floor plan created an open and welcoming atmosphere. The interior of the building was filled with natural light, which illuminated the intricate details of the stained-glass windows and the beautiful woodwork on the pews. The space was designed to be both functional and beautiful, with plenty of seating and a stage that was visible from every angle of the room. It was clear that the architects had paid attention to every detail, from the acoustics to the flow of foot traffic.
Table of Contents
The Beauty in the Details The Functionality of the Space The Community Impact The Sustainability of the Building The Accessibility of the Building The Future of the Building The Beauty in the Details One of the most impressive aspects of Christ Community Church was the attention to detail in every aspect of the building. From the exterior brickwork to the intricate designs on the pews, it was clear that every element of the building had been carefully considered. One of the most striking features of the church was the stunning stained glass windows that were placed throughout the space. These windows were not only beautiful, but they also served a practical function by illuminating the space with natural light. The colors and designs of the windows were carefully chosen to create a peaceful and welcoming atmosphere.
The Functionality of the Space While the beauty of Christ Community Church is undeniable, what impressed me most was the functionality of the space. The architects had clearly thought through every aspect of the building, from the flow of foot traffic to the acoustics of the room. The space was designed to be flexible, with movable seating and a stage that could be adjusted to suit the needs of any event. Despite the large size of the room, the acoustics were excellent, making it the perfect venue for concerts and performances. Overall, I was impressed by the balance between form and function that was evident in every aspect of the building.
The Community Impact Christ Community Church is more than just a beautiful building; it is a place that has had a positive impact on the community of Aurora. The church has been a hub for community events and gatherings, and the flexible space has been used for everything from concerts to community meetings. The church has also been involved in a number of outreach programs, such as providing meals for those in need and partnering with local schools to provide resources for families. It is clear that Christ Community Church is more than just a building; it is a place that is making a real difference in the lives of those in the community.
The Sustainability of the Building One aspect of Christ Community Church that is often overlooked is its sustainability. The architects made a conscious effort to design a building that was energy-efficient and environmentally friendly. The building features high-efficiency HVAC systems, LED lighting, and a green roof that helps to reduce the building’s carbon footprint. The church has also implemented a number of recycling and waste reduction programs, further demonstrating their commitment to sustainability. It is refreshing to see a building that not only looks beautiful but also has a positive impact on the environment.
The Accessibility of the Building Another impressive aspect of Christ Community Church is its accessibility. The architects went to great lengths to ensure that the building was accessible to people of all abilities. The building features ramps and elevators that allow people with mobility impairments to easily navigate the space. The bathrooms are also designed to be accessible, with features such as grab bars and raised toilet seats. It is clear that the architects were committed to creating a space that was welcoming and accessible to everyone.
The Future of the Building As I reflect on my visit to Christ Community Church, I am struck by the thoughtfulness and intentionality that went into every aspect of the building. This is a building that is not only beautiful but also functional, sustainable, and accessible. It is clear that the architects and builders were committed to creating a space that would have a positive impact on the community of Aurora. As the church continues to grow and evolve, I am excited to see how this remarkable building will continue to play a role in the community.
Aspect of the Building Description Beauty in the Details Intricate details such as stained glass windows and intricate carvings on the pews. Functionality of the Space Flexible space with movable seating and excellent acoustics. Community Impact A hub for community events and outreach programs. Sustainability of the Building Energy-efficient and environmentally friendly with high-efficiency HVAC systems and recycling programs. Accessibility of the Building Ramps and elevators for people with mobility impairments and accessible bathrooms.
Source: www.eastaurorachristianchurch.org Source: carlsonarchitecture.com Source: www.bca-studios.com Source: carlsonarchitecture.com Source: carlsonarchitecture.com Source: www.dailyherald.com Source: aurora-il.alluschurches.com Source: ccclife.org Source: communitychristian.org Source: www.christcommunitychurch.info Source: communitychristian.org Source: ccclife.org Source: carlsonarchitecture.com

text:

author: mleung
title: Hurry! Nike's best running shoes are 30% off right now - The Manual
text:
Nike Run (don’t walk) to catch one of the best Nike deals of the season. Step your shoe game up and get select styles of the Nike Vaporfly 3 for just $182. That’s 30% off the original $260 price tag. This reworked sneaker is the perfect combination of style and functionality, made for runners, walkers, and everyone in-between whether you’re outdoors, on a track, or treadmill . It’s also available in a variety of colors, so you can pick the perfect match for your wardrobe.
Why you should buy the Nike Vaporfly 3 No matter your speed, you’ll be stepping out in comfort. The Vaporfly 3 has tried and true features along with new additions, like light padding at the tongue to reduce lace pressure at the top of your foot, a brand new waffle outsole with perforations to save weight and deliver high-quality traction no matter the weather, an offset heel seam to keep your heel free from friction, and specially-selected Flyknit yarn engineered zones at the forefront so you can propel your performance to the next level.
Recommended Videos Don’t worry about sweat as you stride. The shoe provides an ample amount of breathability while soft and supportive yarns give customized comfort as the cool design conforms to your foot. So there’s no need to slow down or take breaks to adjust, keeping you on your a-game. Even more comfort features include a bulged out midsole by the heel to help reduce weight on the inside of the foot for a more stable ride and an updated thin outsole rubber made with less material (without sacrificing durability) to help reduce outsole weight and thickness.
Related Asics semi-annual sale: Get a pair of running shoes for $30 One of Nike’s best running shoes is 26% off right now I’m jealous — My running shoes are $63 off for Cyber Monday The shoe also includes one-of-a-kind technology for ultimate comfort. It’s fitted with ZoomX foam at the underfoot for a smoother transition through your stride. The ZoomX is Nike’s most responsive foam which enhances running from heel to toe by unlocking more energy return, for a springy step and bouncy feel.
Run, jump, and step in style with increased performance in the Nike Vaporfly 3. Take advantage and snag this elevated shoe for just $182 (originally $260) so you can save 30% on select style. Add these to your cart so you can hit the ground running.
